CustomField.description: no longer used after March 2021 due to AP2021
CustomField.formula:
IF(AND( PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c, PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c, PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c , PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c, PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c), IF( AND(PSR_Cost_BU_NE_DAaaS__c > PSR_Cost_BU_NE_EOP__c , PSR_Cost_BU_NE_DAaaS__c > PSR_Cost_BU_NE_IoT__c ) , "NE DAaaS", IF( PSR_Cost_BU_NE_EOP__c > PSR_Cost_BU_NE_IoT__c , "NE EOP", IF( PSR_Cost_BU_NE_IoT__c > 0 , "NE IoT", null))),
IF(AND(PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Group_FN__c, PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Group_GS__c, PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Group_MN__c , PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Group_AA__c, PSR_Cost_Business_Group_ION__c > PSR_Cost_BG_NEN__c) ,IF( AND( PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_DNI__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c), "ION IPR",
IF( AND( PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_MPC__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c), "ION IPR",
IF( AND( PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c, PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c, PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c, PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_IPR__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c), "ION IPR",
IF( AND( PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Services__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c), "ION IPR",
IF( AND( PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c > PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c, PSR_Cost_BU_ION_IPR_Nuage__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c), "ION IPR",
IF( AND( PSR_Cost_Business_Unit_ION_Optics__c > PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c), "ION Optics",
IF(PSR_Cost_BU_ION_Optics_Services__c > 0, "ION Optics", null ))))))),null)
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field only applies either ION or NEN is the Lead BG.
CustomField.label: OLD Lead BU Pre-Sales
